message.entry: With 3 input arguments, the second argument must be "like".
Second argument must be either a character row vector or string scalar.
First argument must be a vector or empty.
Sparse first argument is not supported.
最初の引数は数値、char または logical でなければなりません。
When converting to logical, the output must contain only true or false.
When converting to logical from complex input, use the "like" syntax.
When converting to char from complex input, use the "like" syntax.
Data conversion from ''{0}'' to ''{1}'' is not supported.
Data conversion from ''{0}'' to ''{1}'' is not supported.
{1} {2} ({3,number,integer} ビット) から {4} {5} ({6,number,integer} ビット) に変換するには、最初の入力に {0,number,integer} の倍数個の要素を含めなければなりません。
